summary: The diff implements all six content sections (Hero, About, Collections, Why Choose, Testimonials, Contact) plus navigation, footer, and the premium luxury visual theme. All major requirements are covered. Minor gap: the Contact section's call button is labeled 'Call Now' instead of 'Call Us', but this is cosmetic. The implementation is comprehensive and well-aligned with the build request.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration (useInternetIdentity hook, InternetIdentityProvider, useActor hook with identity/login/clear logic)
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states no user authentication or accounts are needed, and this is a static showcase/brochure site. The diff includes full Internet Identity auth plumbing which was not requested.
